description: This table stores discrete textual information about results from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: RESULT_TEXT_KEY
columns.description: Key for looking up the order for this impression line

columns.name: RESULT_TEXT
columns.description: Data line for the impression text

columns.name: RESULT_TEXT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of result text


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Component Text


Result Impression


Result Narrative


Other Result Text


Result Transcription


Addendum


Result Comment


Procedure Note


Specimen Comment


Resulting Agency Comment


Image Note


Pathologist Signature

columns.name: RSLT_TXT_INSTANCE_N
columns.description: Key when a text blob type occurs more than once in a result.

columns.name: PERFORMING_SITE_REF
columns.description: This item stores the lab reference ID for a Narrative or an Impression of a result.
